biotools.summary: BigDataProcessor2 (BDP2) is a Fiji plugin for interactive processing of TB-sized image data. BDP2 uses BigDataViewer for rendering and the ImgLib2 library for image processing.

bioschemas.name: BigDataProcessor2
bioschemas.summary: BigDataProcessor2 (BDP2) is a Fiji plugin for interactive processing of TB-sized image data. BDP2 uses BigDataViewer for rendering and the ImgLib2 library for image processing.
